welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brant, Canada! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and rich history, we invite you to discover all that our city has to offer and enjoy your stay to the fullest."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport is used for private and charter flights, offering a more personalized and efficient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and accept the terms and conditions to connect.
